data.title: Party time & Family time
data.text: Vintage arcade! Went for a birthday party.  Childs wristband is good all day so paid for adults and stayed. The wristband allows unlimited play. This is a unique and fun place at a great price.  $7 for kids, $10 for adults. You can come and go all day with wristbands.  Love the 80's theme, 80's games, 80's music, etc.  Games are well maintained and in great shape.  Pinball was my personal favorite.  Check this place out!

data.title: So much fun
data.text: For a small admission fee you are free to play all day long. There are tons of pinball games and also some older arcade games. So much fun!

data.title: Fun!
data.text: Awesome establishment! Had hours of nostalgic fun here. Several families as well as lots of young adults! A good time for everyone.
